net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics

Interface Renderable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultState, State, StateManager

    public interface Renderable
    An interface that defines behaviors that any object that is visually representable on a Viewable should implement.
    Since:
    Jun 11, 2015, 2:49:57 AM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(GraphicsX g)
      Used to draw a renderable object to the current Viewable.
      void update(double delta)
      Used to change the state of a renderable object.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(double delta)
        Used to change the state of a renderable object.
        Parameters:
        delta - The amount of game loop cycles that have gone by since the last cycle, 1.0 being a full cycle

      • render

        void render(GraphicsX g)
        Used to draw a renderable object to the current Viewable.
        Parameters:
        g - The GraphicsX context used for rendering
